title: PM Sheikh Hasina asked ministries to take steps to ensure food and education for every ...
text: ( Source : Bangladesh Awami League ) Published on Sunday, 11 October 2015 11:15 Hits: 8 Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina today asked the ministries of women and children affairs and social welfare to take necessary steps to ensure food, shelter
